trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods and any overridden versions of <xref uid="langword_csharp_OnPaint" name="OnPaint" href=""></xref> in classes that derive from them, when they are drawn on a workflow design surface.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `OnPaint` method calls occur when an activity designer, glyph, or connector is redrawn on a workflow design surface.
ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified graphics, clipping rectangle, viewport and designer theme.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the rectangle in which to draw.
The view port in which to draw.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the object to draw.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> associated with the workflow design surface.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe workflow look and feel properties, such as colors, styles and backgrounds.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> that contains theme information for the workflow.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> in which to draw.

The area described by the clipping rectangle is the area on the screen that will be redrawn using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area to draw.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> associated with the designer.

If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.

If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that describes the designer look and feel.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> provides methods for drawing objects on the workflow design surface.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
